DialogueOption.Text: Use the shiplog to track places I've been to. Got it! Thank you! Seeya!
Yeah yeah yeah, I already know about the launch codes.
Use the shiplog to track places I've been to. Got it! Thank you! Seeya!

Dialogue.Page: Oh, just a heads up. I added some shelves inside the ship you can use to stow away anything cool you find on your travels.
The other travelers told me they "didn't feel safe" just leaving stuff around the ship's floor while the ship was flying at high speed through space.
Just uh, don't go overboard and start hoarding everything you see. The ship's cluttered enough as is.
Uh, no. What are you talking about?
I was gonna ask if you were gonna say goodbye to everyone before you take off. The whole village's gonna miss you, you know?
If nothing else, at least say bye to the little hatchlings. All of 'em always have something to ask or say to the new astronaut before they go.
Go humor 'em, just in case this is last they see of you for a while, y'know?
